Flub.Name: Mode
Flub.Description: Select from three modes of the texture.

Flub.Name: Patches
Flub.Description: The amount of patches on the texture.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.

Flub.Name: Slope
Flub.Description: The amount of slope influence in the texture.

Flub.Name: Soil
Flub.Description: The amount of soil influence in the texture.

Flub.Name: Chaos
Flub.Description: The amount of chaos in the output.

Flub.Name: Classic Version
Flub.Description: Use the classic version of texture
